description: The Minnesota town where one of the most famous scenes from Prince's movie "Purple Rain" was filmed has unveiled a life-sized bronze statue of The Purple One in a garden filled with purple flowers and other tributes to the artist.

author: Nicole Chavez, CNN
title: A hiker died after a fall at the Grand Canyon
description: A woman hiking at the Grand Canyon National Park died after a fall near Mather Point on the canyon's South Rim, park officials said on Saturday.
content:

author: Susannah Cullinane, Homero DeLaFuente and Joe Youorski
title: Former Phillies pitcher, three others die in Utah plane crash
description: Former Philadelphia Phillies pitcher Tyson Brummett was among four people killed when a small plane crashed Friday in Utah, according to the Utah County Sheriff.

title: Kavanaugh denies request from Illinois Republicans to block rule barring gatherings of more than 50 people
description: Supreme Court Justice Brett Kavanaugh denied a request from Illinois Republicans to block Illinois Gov. J.B. Pritzker's rule that bars political rallies of more than 50 people amid the coronavirus pandemic.
